page.title: 01Social survey
page.content: Out of a sample of{124 people interviewed only{2 people disliked Guisborough totally,so it seems to be a{popular,well liked}town.These are the aspects we found people{liked about Guisborough. 1)The{countryside}setting,it's{natural {beauty}and{fresh air.2)Friendly people 3)Village atmosphere.4)Schools.5)Shops 6)Market.7)Central Location.8)Peaceful (except on market days)9)Old{buildings 10)Plenty of{pubs. Here are some aspects people{disliked 1)Too much change.2)Traffic parking problems.3)Crowded and noisy.4)Litter. 5)Cobbles.6)New buildings.7)Lack of entertainments. { They suggested changes:- {1)A by-pass.2)More shops.3)More car {parks.4)Road closed on market days. {5)More facilities for sports and {children.6)More plants in town centre.
